text: Uye vagadzirirei hondo yakasimba kusanganisira mabhiza ehondo (zvombo zvehondo, pfuti, ndege, motokari nezvimwe zvakadaro) kuti mutyise nazvo vavengi vaAllah uye nemi, uye neavo vamusingazivi vasiri pakati pavo, asi vachizivikanwa naAllah. Uye chingava chipi chamunoshandisa munzira yaAllah chichabhadharwa kwamuri, uye hamuzombodzvanyirirwi
